definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

sentences.english: I'm immune to smallpox as a result of vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 我種過牛痘了，所以對天花有免疫力。

sentences.english: This Product has the functions of antifatigue and adjusting immune.
sentences.chinese: 產品具有抗疲勞和調節免疫力的功能。

sentences.english: Or is it that American murderers are uniquely immune to such threats?
sentences.chinese: 還是說美國殺人犯對這類威脅有特別的免疫力？

sentences.english: They are immune from smallpox due to vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經種痘，對天花有免疫力。

sentences.english: Maternal immunity is the immunity transferred from mother to offspring.
sentences.chinese: 母源性免疫即母體傳遞給子代的免疫力。

sentences.english: All-round lifting love bestows favor on immunity.
Diphtheria is. treated with an antitoxin that neutralizes the toxin and produces long-term immunity.
sentences.chinese: 治療方式爲及時注射白喉抗毒素，產生長期的免疫力。

sentences.english: These indicate that this herb has the effects of increasing organism immunity and supporting healthy energy.
sentences.chinese: 說明該藥具有提高機體免疫力，扶正固本的作用。

sentences.english: It degrades the capacity of the immune system and increases the risk of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 會降低人體的免疫力，增加得癌症的風險。

sentences.english: Now traditional Chinese medicine to improve one's immunity has become a fast-selling product.
sentences.chinese: 現在增強免疫力的中藥成了搶手貨。

sentences.english: Germanium, natural metalloid element raising body's immunity and easing pain.
sentences.chinese: 鍺，天然非金屬元素提高人體的免疫力，緩解疼痛。

sentences.english: DNA is simple and does not have the problem of anti-vector immunity.
sentences.chinese: DNA簡單又不會產生抗載體免疫力的問題。

sentences.english: To enhance immunity, prevent colds allergies, dermatitis, angular cheilitis .
sentences.chinese: 增強免疫力，預防感冒過敏，皮膚炎，口角炎。

sentences.english: These results suggested that YQZY enhanced the memory and the immunity of the body.
sentences.chinese: 表明益氣助陽液具有提高機體免疫力和記憶力的作用。

sentences.english: Chronic stress is associated with depression and suppressed immunity.
sentences.chinese: 長期的精神緊張與抑鬱和免疫力低下有關。

sentences.english: Remember those ads about topping up your ‘good bacteria’ – well they have the right idea.
sentences.chinese: 記住那些能夠提升你免疫力的廣告，他們部分是對的。
